description: The White Calling app gives you low cost international calls you can rely on.  FREE credit when you install the app  try us out!  Why the White Calling app?  The White Calling app lets you call any phone number, so reliability is great and theres no need for the other person to have the app to receive a call. In short, its the easiest, most reliable way to call friends and loved ones around the world.  - Lowest international call rates - Mobile Airtime Top-up: recharge loved ones pay-as-you-go mobiles with voice and data, all over the world - Great call quality and reliability - calling real phone numbers, instead of app-to-app  - Really easy to use - More FREE credit when you invite friends to the app!   White Calling gives you three ways to call  Have monthly inclusive minutes from your mobile provider?... Let the app call via local access number  we route your call to your international number automatically  giving you the best call quality and reliability Note: local access number calling is not available in all countries  Call over Wi-Fi Ideal if you are on Pay As You Go, or have poor phone reception - and perfect for when youre travelling  Call over 3G/4G Great if you have a big monthly data allowance   Use a White Calling card? You can add your card PIN in the app to use your card credit!
